title: Instructional Design-Based Educational Program for Postpartum Hemorrhage Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic obstetrics and gynecology knowledge and experience handling emergency situations
context.additional_context: Practical training-focused education using digital devices and simulation equipment, providing an integrated learning environment connecting theoretical foundations with actual clinical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners perform clinical judgment and procedural interventions with over 90% accuracy in postpartum hemorrhage simulation scenarios.
Learners establish effective collaboration systems in over 80% of situations by applying team-based communication protocols.
Learners apply acquired skills in real clinical settings at over 70% proficiency within two weeks post-simulation training.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
